pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a patched version of Gentoo's gtk+:3 ebuild adding the USE=atk-bridge flag.

use.flag: Enable the dev-libs/atk runtime bridge. This is rarely used, spawns extra runtime processes, and adds a dependency on DBus to libgtk-3.
Enable printing via Google Cloud Print.
Use x11-misc/colord for color management in printing
